      • isItemInWorkflow

        public boolean isItemInWorkflow(Context context,
                       Item item)
                         throws DSpaceSwordException
        Is the given item in the DSpace workflow? This method queries the database directly to determine if this is the case rather than using the DSpace API (which is very slow).
        Parameters:
        context -
        item -
        Throws:
        DSpaceSwordException

        public InProgressSubmission getWorkflowItem(Context context,
                                   Item item)
                                     throws DSpaceSwordException
        Obtain the WorkflowItem object which wraps the given Item. This method queries the database directly to determine if this is the case rather than using the DSpace API (which is very slow).
